DESCRIPTION: Effect triggers if playing the card triggers a character switch.
A projected card is played at the start of your next turn at no cost.
Magick cards additionally scale their damage and Block with #ySpell #yPower.
Place a card on top of your draw pile.
When you obtain #b10 #yProvidence, draw #b1 card and #yAscend it.
#yAscending cards upgrades them and makes them more powerful for this combat.
When you play this card, #yProject a copy of it.
